message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me and your potential profit.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the value it will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $16,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me and your potential profit. If we can reach an agreement at this price, I'm ready to finalize the purchase.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $15,000, which is my minimum price. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the value it will bring to you. If we can agree on this price, I'm ready to finalize the sale.
